description: Episode of Series "Searching for values: a film anthology". Presents a story of one man's ruthless determination to succeed in business at the expense of his co-workers. Shows how destruction of self and others results when an unthwarted will goes beyond the norms of reason. Edited from the Columbia Pictures 1969 motion picture entitled "The Reckoning".
